enWisdom: When you are blessed with sustenance then give generously

Wisdom: مَنْ أُوسِعَ عَلَيْهِ نِعْمَةٌ وَجَبَ عَلَيْهِ أَنْ يُوسِعَ النَّاسَ إِنْعَاماً
enWisdom: It is incumbent upon the one whom Allah has munificently blessed to be generous in granting favours to the people

Wisdom: مَنْ زَادَهُ اللَّهُ كَرَامَةً فَحَقِيقٌ بِهِ أَنْ يَزِيدَ النَّاسَ إِكْرَاماً
enWisdom: It is a right upon one whose esteem has been increased by Allah that he should [in turn] be more respectful to the people

Wisdom: لَا تَعُدَّنَّ غَنِيّاً مَنْ لَمْ يُرْزَقْ مِنْ مَالِهِ
enWisdom: Never count the one from whose wealth others don’t get sustenance as a rich person
